00007 #include "Common/Compat.h"

00009 namespace Hypertable {
00010 
00011 #undef get16bits
00012 #if (defined(__GNUC__) && defined(__i386__)) || defined(__WATCOMC__) \
00013   || defined(_MSC_VER) || defined (__BORLANDC__) || defined (__TURBOC__)
00014 #define get16bits(d) (*((const uint16_t *) (d)))
00015 #endif
00016 
00017 #if !defined (get16bits)
00018 #define get16bits(d) ((((uint32_t)(((const uint8_t *)(d))[1])) << 8)\
00019                        +(uint32_t)(((const uint8_t *)(d))[0]) )
00020 #endif
00021 
00022 uint32_t superfasthash(const void * start, size_t len, uint32_t hash) {
00023   const char *data = (const char *)start;
00024   uint32_t tmp;
00025   int rem;
00026 
00027   if (len <= 0 || data == NULL) return 0;
00028 
00029   rem = len & 3;
00030   len >>= 2;
00031 
00032   /* Main loop */
00033   for (;len > 0; len--) {
00034     hash  += get16bits (data);
00035     tmp    = (get16bits (data+2) << 11) ^ hash;
00036     hash   = (hash << 16) ^ tmp;
00037     data  += 2*sizeof (uint16_t);
00038     hash  += hash >> 11;
00039   }
00040 
00041   /* Handle end cases */
00042   switch (rem) {
00043   case 3: hash += get16bits (data);
00044     hash ^= hash << 16;
00045     hash ^= data[sizeof (uint16_t)] << 18;
00046     hash += hash >> 11;
00047     break;
00048   case 2: hash += get16bits (data);
00049     hash ^= hash << 11;
00050     hash += hash >> 17;
00051     break;
00052   case 1: hash += *data;
00053     hash ^= hash << 10;
00054     hash += hash >> 1;
00055   }
00056 
00057   /* Force "avalanching" of final 127 bits */
00058   hash ^= hash << 3;
00059   hash += hash >> 5;
00060   hash ^= hash << 4;
00061   hash += hash >> 17;
00062   hash ^= hash << 25;
00063   hash += hash >> 6;
00064 
00065   return hash;
00066 }
00067 
00068 } // namespace Hypertable
